Verses: 1 aapip Maadhaththaik Gavaniththirundhu, Adhil Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkup Paskaavai Aasarikkakkadavaai; Aapipmaadhaththile Iraakkaalaththil Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unnai Egipthilirundhu Purappadappanninaare.
2 karththar Thamadhu Naamam Vilangumbadi Therindhukollum Sthaanaththil, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkup Paskaavin Baliyaagiya Aadumaadugalaip Baliyiduvaayaaga.

3 nee Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Purappatta Naalai Nee Uyirodirukkum Naalellaam Ninaikkumbadi, Paskaappaliyudane Pulippulla Appam Pusiyaamal, Sirumaiyin Appamaagiya Pulippillaadha Appangalai Ezhunaalvaraikkum Pusikkakkadavaai; Nee Theeviramaai Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Purappattabadiyinaal Ippadich Seyyavendum.

4 ezhunaal Alavum Un Ellaigalilengum Pulippulla Appam Unnidaththil Kaanappadalaagaadhu; Nee Mudhalnaal Saayangaalaththil Itta Baliyin Maamsaththil Edhaagilum Iraamuzhudhum Vidiyar Kaalamvaraikkum Vaikkavendaam.
5 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuk Kodukkum Unnudaiya Vaasalgalil Edhilum Nee Paskaavai Adikkavendaam.
6 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Thamadhu Naamam Vilangumbadi Therindhukollum Sthaanaththile, Nee Egipthilirundhu Purappatta Neramaagiya Saayangaalaththile Sooriyan Asthamikkirapodhu Paskaavai Adiththu,
7 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Therindhukonda Sthaanaththile, Adhaipporiththup Pusiththu, Vidiyarkaalaththile Un Koodaarangalukkuth Thirumbippovaayaaga.
8 nee Aarunaalum Pulippillaadha Appam Pusikkavendum; Ezhaam Naal Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Aasarikkappadum Naalaayirukkum; Adhile Yaadhoru Velaiyum Seyyavendaam.
9 ezhu Vaarangalai Ennuvaayaaga; Aruppu Arukkath Thodangum Kaalamudhal Nee Andha Ezhu Vaarangalaiyum Ennavendum.

10 avaigal Mudindhapodhu Vaarangalin Pandigaiyai Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Endru Aasariththu, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unnai Aaseervadhiththadharkuth Thakkadhaai Un Kaikku Nerndha Manappoorvamaana Kaanikkaiyaagiya Pagudhiyaich Seluththi,

11 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Thamadhu Naamam Vilangumbadi Therindhukollum Sthaanaththile, Neeyum, Un Kumaaranum, Un Kumaaraththiyum, Un Velaikkaaranum, Unvelaikkaariyum, Un Vaasalgalil Irukkira Leviyanum, Unnidaththil Irukkira Paradhesiyum, Thikkatra Pillaiyum, Vidhavaiyum, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Sandhoshappattu,
12 nee Egipthil Adimaiyaayirundhadhai Ninaiththu, Indhak Kattalaigalaik Kaikkondu Ivaigalinbadi Seyyakkadavaai.
13 nee Un Kalaththin Balanaiyum Un Aalaiyin Balanaiyum Serththapinbu, Koodaarappandigaiyai Ezhunaal Aasariththu,

14 un Pandigaiyil Neeyum, Un Kumaaranum, Un Kumaaraththiyum Un Velaikkaaranum, Un Velaikkaariyum, Un Vaasalgalil Irukkira Leviyanum, Paradhesiyum, Thikkatra Pillaiyum, Vidhavaiyum Sandhoshappadakkadaveergal;

15 unakku Undaana Ellaa Varaththilum Un Kaigaludaiya Ellaak Kiriyaiyilum Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unnai Aaseervadhiththabadiyinaal, Karththar Therindhu Kollum Sthaanaththil Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Ezhunaalalavum Pandigaiyai Aasariththuch Sandhoshamaayiruppaayaaga.

16 varushaththil Moondrudharam Pulippillaadha Appappandigaiyilum, Vaarangalin Pandigaiyilum, Koodaarappandigaiyilum, Un Aanmakkal Ellaarum Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Therindhukollum Sthaanaththile, Avar Sannidhikku Munbaaga Vandhu Kaanappadakkadavargal.

17 aanaalum Avargal Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Verungaiyode Varaamal, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakku Aruliya Aaseervaadhaththirkuththakkadhaaga, Avanavan Than Than Thagudhikku Etrapadi Kaanikkaiyaik Konduvarakkadavan.

18 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Un Koththirangal Dhorum Unakkuk Kodukkum Vaasalgalilellaam, Niyaayaadhibadhigalaiyum Thalaivaraiyum Erpaduththuvaayaaga; Avargal Needhiyudan Janangalukku Niyaayaththeerppuch Seyyakkadavargal.

19 niyaayaththaip Purattaadhiruppaayaaga; Mugadhaatchiniyam Pannaamalum, Paridhaanam Vaangaamalum Iruppaayaaga; Paridhaanam Gnaanigalin Kangalaik Kurudaakki, Needhimaangalin Niyaayangalaith Thaarumaaraakkum.
20 nee Pizhaiththu, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuk Kodukkum Dhesaththaich Sudhandhariththukkollumbadikku Needhiyaiye Pinbatruvaayaaga.
21 nee Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Undaakkum Balibeedaththandaiyil Yaadhoru Thoppaiyum Undaakka Vendaam;
22 yaadhoru Silaiyaiyum Niruththavendaam; Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Adhai Verukkiraar.
